scripts.start:ats: npm ci && npm run build:ats:contracts && npm run build:ats:sdk && npm run install:ats:web:lock && cd apps/ats/web && yarn dev
scripts.build:ats:all: npm run build:ats:contracts && npm run build:ats:sdk && npm run build:ats:web
scripts.clean: npm run clean:all:modules && npm run clean:all:build
scripts.clean:atscontracts:modules: cd packages/ats/contracts && npm run clean node_modules
scripts.clean:ats:all:modules: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npx -y concurrently "npm run clean:ats:sdk:modules" "npm run clean:ats:web:modules" "npm run clean:ats:contracts:modules"
scripts.clean:ats:all:build: npx -y concurrently "npm run clean:ats:sdk:build" "npm run clean:ats:web:build" "npm run clean:ats:contracts:build"
scripts.prettier: npx -y concurrently "npm run prettier:sdk" "npm run prettier:web" "npm run prettier:contracts"
